name: Path Defender: Loops
description:
[2-player, best played fullscreen]

Controls 1st Player:

Lane Left - "1"
Lane Center- "2"
Lane Right - "3"

Collector - "q"
Attacker- "w"
Heavy Attacker- "e"

Controls 2nd Player:

Lane Left - "7"
Lane Center- "8"
Lane Right - "9"

Collector - "u"
Attacker- "i"
Heavy Attacker- "o"

Path defender - an old idea re-invented for the Black and White Jam: Loop in '22. Check out this strategic small 2-player-local game.

There are two entites: The black and the white faction - both are equally set in strength and speed. It's only the tactics which differ.
Defend your base by spawning normal or heavy attack entities. Increase your income by spawning collectors. For every loop they do and every package they drop, they gain more points with every run - so try to defend your collectors with a high loop count.

Also be aware of collisions: Spawning  a lot of collectors could it make difficult to get though the enemy base when spawing attacking units. Choose wisely and be fast than you opponent.
